scenario_text.value: Huh...?
What is it, Minoru?

No, I just thought I saw something for a
second there...
“Something”?

Can’t say for sure, but it might not be
a friendly face.
I’ll go and check!

What’re you saying?! The plan was to stick
together, so follow the plan!

Jeez, it’s not worth getting so pissed off!
I just wanted to have a little look-see!

Well regardless, I’m not letting you go!
Got it? Well DO YOU?!

Calm down, Shuuji! Minoru understands. You
don’t have to tear into him like that.
Yeah, what she said!

What the heck do you know about humans?!
Keep quiet!

Come on, that is no way to speak to Lopmon.
What do you think that will accomplish?
At any rate, don’t separate from the group!
All right, already...
Argh...

Hey, Takuma, is it okay to leave those two
like that?

Yeah, I’m a little worried myself...
Still, what can we even say?
Yeah, I dunno... I’m stumped.

(All of us should be able to get along, but
how can we explain that to him?)
(Neither Agumon nor I have the answer...)

*sigh*... Did you see that, Takuma?
The heck’s up with Shuuji?!

That wasn’t anything worth screaming about.
Man, now I’M pissed!!!

Shuuji is trying as hard as he can. I get how
you feel, but try not to be too upset.

Okay, I guess. If that’s what you want to do,
Takuma.

Huh? Argh, not again! Enough with these bogus
messages!

Oh...another garbled text. Seriously, what’s
up with this?
Yeah, they just keep on coming.

It’s not like we can reach anyone with these
things. Stop getting our hopes up!

(Everyone’s in a bad mood...
What should I do?)
